question: A maintenance worker has to clean a university with 105 floors. They have 7 days to get it done. It takes them 30 minutes per floor. If they work 16 hours each day, what percentage of their day, on average, is spent cleaning floors?
answer:
They have to clean 15 floors a day because 105 / 7 = <<105/7=15>>15
They spend 450 minutes cleaning per day because 15*30 = <<15*30=450>>450
They spend 7.5 hours a day because 450 / 60 = <<450/60=7.5>>7.5
They spend 15/32 of their day cleaning floors because 7.5 / 16 = <<7.5/16=0.46875>>0.46875
They spend 46% of their day cleaning floors because 0.46875*100 = <<0.46875*100=46>>46
#### 46
